special_powers.description: Wolverine can use Blades/Claws/Fangs and Poison. When he uses Poison, roll a d6 after the action resolves. On a result of 4 - 6, deal 1 penetrating damage to each adjacent opposing character.
This character can use Charge, Improved Movement: Destroy Blocking, Hindering, and Toughness. This character modifies its attack value by +2.
This character can use Charge, Improved Movement: Elevated, Characters, and Toughness. This character modifies its attack value by +2.

additions.name: The Book of the Skull Fortress

special_powers.name: Security Drones
special_powers.description: (Not for Tournament Play) Orange squares are Security Drone squares. After any action resolves, if the character given the action moved into or through a square within 2 squares of a Security Drone, that drone makes a ranged combat attack targeting that character with 9 attack, 2 damage. This attack does not need range or line of fire.

special_powers.name: Kuurth's Hammer Impact Zone
special_powers.description: (Not for Tournament Play) Orange squares are IMPACT ZONE squares. Before the beginning of the game either player may place a Fear Itself S101 Kuurth's Hammer from outside the game in the Impact Zone. While that object occupies the Impact Zone, characters within 6 squares of the Impact Zone can't use Charge.

special_powers.name: Skadi's Hammer Impact Zone
special_powers.description: (Not for Tournament Play) Orange squares are IMPACT ZONE squares. Before the beginning of the game either player may place a Fear Itself S201 Skadi's Hammer from outside the game in the Impact Zone. While that object occupies the Impact Zone, characters within 6 squares of the Impact Zone can't use Leadership.

special_powers.name: Mokk's Hammer Impact Zone
special_powers.description: (Not for Tournament Play) Orange squares are IMPACT ZONE squares. Before the beginning of the game either player may place a Fear Itself S102 Mokk's Hammer from outside the game in the Impact Zone. While that object occupies the Impact Zone, characters within 6 squares of the Impact Zone can't use Team Abilities.

special_powers.name: Angrier's Hammer Impact Zone
special_powers.description: (Not for Tournament Play) Orange squares are IMPACT ZONE squares. Before the beginning of the game either player may place a Fear Itself S107 Angrir's Hammer from outside the game in the Impact Zone. While that object occupies the Impact Zone, characters within 6 squares of the Impact Zone can't use Support or Regeneration.

special_powers.name: Skirn's Hammer Impact Zone
special_powers.description: (Not for Tournament Play) Orange squares are IMPACT ZONE squares. Before the beginning of the game either player may place a Fear Itself S103 Skirn's Hammer from outside the game in the Impact Zone. While that object occupies the Impact Zone, characters within 6 squares of the Impact Zone can't use Outwit.

special_powers.name: Uru Forge
special_powers.description: Orange squares are Uru Forge squares. At the beginning of your turn, friendly characters occupying Uru Forge squares are dealt 1 unavoidable damage and are given an Uru token. Characters modify their attack and defense values by -1 for each Uru token they are assigned. When a character takes damage from an attack, remove all Uru tokens from that character.

special_powers.name: Greithoth's Hammer Impact Zone
special_powers.description: (Not for Tournament Play) Orange squares are IMPACT ZONE squares. Before the beginning of the game either player may place a Fear Itself S104 Greithoth's Hammer from outside the game in the Impact Zone. While that object occupies the Impact Zone, characters within 6 squares of the Impact Zone can't use Willpower.

special_powers.name: Yggdrasil, The World Tree
special_powers.description: Orange squares are hindering terrain. When damage would be dealt to a character occupying these squares, ignore 1 of that damage. Ignoring damage this way does not prevent the damage from being reduced or ignored by another game effect.

special_powers.name: Ocean Depths
special_powers.description: Characters ignore the water terrain for movement purposes. Characters that can use the Swim ability modify their speed value by +2 and can use Improved Movement: Hindering, Elevated, Characters.

Before the beginning of the game either player may place a Fear Itself S105 Nerkkod's Hammer from outside the game in the Impact Zone. While that object occupies the Impact Zone, characters within 6 squares of the Impact Zone have (Foot Symbol).

special_powers.description: Characters ignore the water terrain for movement purposes. Characters that can use the Swim ability modify their speed value by +2 and can use Improved Movement: Hindering, Elevated, Characters.
